Text: I thought I had labeled it- it's the Pirate Bay database from just before the tracker was shut down.

Everything that the pirate bay was connected to before they had to move from sweden. All videos, all games....EVERYTHING. It's in a format to allow us (any of the downloaders) to host a pirate bay 'branch office' for lack of a better term.

This is the FULL thing, even the frontend site? Awesome! Keep seeding guys, I want to host a copy, and convert another copy of the frontend into my own torrent site, as I'm now getting used to the TPB site!
I promise to try and seed this indefinitely once finished on my seedbox ;)
Can't wait for a title|description|magnet link dump!
That is pretty awesome... but now I think people can  get a more compressed version of this..
